alert.note: Alert for Iberville; Pointe Coupee; West Baton Rouge (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 07 at 4:43PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central West Baton Rouge, southwestern Pointe Coupee and northwestern Iberville Parishes through 515 PM CDT... At 442 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Ramah, or 14 miles northeast of Catahoula, moving northwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Livonia, Maringouin, Fordoche, Rosedale, Grosse Tete, Ramah and Lottie. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Iberville; Pointe Coupee; West Baton Rouge
